data.name: The Story of My Life
data.detailed_description:
The Story of My Life is a kinetic visual novel that explores the life of Noah. From his tween years into young adulthood, dealing with love, loss, and his mental health.

Features:
- IM chat-styled dialogue
- Achievements

This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events, locales, and incidents are either the products of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

data.short_description: The Story of My Life is a kinetic visual novel that explores the life of Noah. From his tween years into young adulthood, dealing with love, loss, and his mental health.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
